The data collect : age ; sex ; height ; weight ; type tumour ; classification malignant tumour ( TNM ) ; progression tumour use therapy ; blood sample analyse albumin , creatine , hemoglobin , LDH CRP ; use parental nutrition ; dietary assessment ; use nutritional supplement ; Quality Life use EORTC-QlQ ; Subjective Global Assessment ; presence Percutaneous endoscopic gastrostomy ; use enteral parenteral nutrition ; body composition base Bio Impedance Assessment ; hand grip strength mid upper arm circumference . Based data point easy use tool/score hospital setting create . During first assessment measurement do morning even test reproducibility .
